posts.title: Homer Simpson Action Figure
posts.content: Who needs friends when you’ve got your old pal Homer Jay Simpson. Whether you feel like eating some donuts, enjoying a nice cold Duff or just laying on the couch like a lazy slob, the Homer Simpson action figure will always be there for you.

posts.title: Grill Floss BBQ Cleaning Tool
posts.content: Keep your grill looking like new by using this Grill Floss bbq cleaning tool after every cookout. This stainless steel tool’s functional design allows you to clean all sides of the round grill grates without having to physically lift them up.

posts.title: Beer Bottle Icicle
posts.content: The beer bottle icicle is the ultimate  way to keep your favorite brew icy cold long after you remove it from the fridge or cooler. The icicle screws on to the top of the bottle and runs the entire length of the bottle to efficiently chill your drink without watering it down.

posts.title: Slip-On Silicone Spout
posts.content: Avoid splashing and spilling the contents of your kitchen pots all over the counter by pouring it using the slip-on silicone spout. This heat resistant spout comes in a slew of vibrant colors and attaches to a variety of mixing bowls, jars, pots, or pans.

posts.title: Floating Ping Pong Table
posts.content: Don’t let a Waterworld like post-apocalyptic event stop you from getting a game on ping pong going – now you can play this fun game anywhere with the floating ping pong table. It’s the perfect playing board for hot summers or after a massive flood.

posts.title: Disposable Hair Traps
posts.content: Keep your drains from getting clogged by a revolting accumulation of wet hair with the disposable hair traps. Simply place it over the the drain before showering and it’ll trap all those loose hairs while allowing the water to flow down the drain.

posts.title: Watch Ya Mouth Party Game
posts.content: Watch Ya Mouth is the incredibly fun game that works by having one player attempt to read phrases out loud while wearing a dental mouthpiece that grossly hampers the ability to enunciate words, while the rest of the players try and guess what is being said.

posts.title: Pop-Up Book Of Celebrity Meltdowns
posts.content: Re-live all the excitement and anguish of watching your favorite on-screen personalities go through their most embarrassing moments as you flip through the pop-up book of celebrity meltdowns — featuring Michael Jackson, Tom Cruise, Paris Hilton, and many more.

posts.title: Insect Push Pins
posts.content: Gross out fellow coworkers by posting your memos using the insect push pins. These creepy crawly push pins are designed like various life like insects that’ll make the office bulletin board appear as if it’s become infested by bugs.

posts.title: Stove In A Can
posts.content: There will be no need to brush up on survival skills before venturing to the great outdoors as long as you make sure to pack the stove in a can – it’ll take care of everything to need to make it through the night – minus providing you with shelter or actual food to cook with.

posts.title: Butter Slice Cutter
posts.content: Easily cut a slice of butter with this handy one click butter slicer. Perfect for preparing your toast in the morning, this butter slice cutter also doubles as a compact storage container for your butter, so it doesn’t start hanging out with the wrong crowd in the fridge.

posts.title: Scratch And Sniff Coloring Pencils
posts.content: Make your masterpieces stand out above all others by creating them using these scratch and sniff coloring pencils. These unique pencils come in a set of twelve and feature fruity and exotic flavors like coconut, watermelon, and strawberry.
